title: Virtual World-Based Collaborative Science Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Students learn in a blended environment where they experience scientific phenomena via a virtual world platform, combining real lab activities with online collaboration. Their scientific problem-solving abilities are assessed through project outcomes.

learning_goals: Complete a molecular structure simulation project using 3D modeling tools in a virtual world platform
Perform real-time data collection and analysis processes with peer learners through a collaboration platform
Produce and present a portfolio covering the entire process from scientific experiment design → virtual implementation → results reporting
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
